sentences:
Sentence 0:
The non-glycosylated form had a slightly higher affinity (Kd = 1.4 +/- 0.4 microM) than the glycosylated vWF-A1 protein (Kd = 4.5 +/- 0.9 microM) but had similar binding capacity of 28,000 GpIb/IX-specific binding sites per platelet.

Sentence 1:
Both E. coli- and CHO-derived vWF-A1 proteins inhibited ristocetin-induced platelet agglutination with IC50 values of 300 nM and 700 nM, respectively.

Sentence 2:
Reduction of the only disulfide bond between C509 and C695 abolished platelet binding activity at concentration up to 2 microM of protein.
sentence_raw: The non-glycosylated form had a slightly higher affinity (Kd = 1.4 +/- 0.4 microM) than the glycosylated vWF-A1 protein (Kd = 4.5 +/- 0.9 microM) but had similar binding capacity of 28,000 GpIb/IX-specific binding sites per platelet.
Both E. coli- and CHO-derived vWF-A1 proteins inhibited ristocetin-induced platelet agglutination with IC50 values of 300 and 700 nM, respectively.
Reduction of the only disulfide bond between C509 and C695 abolished platelet binding activity at concentration up to 2 microM of protein.
